verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: During Monday 's briefing] , [ARG0: a reporter] [V: asked] [ARG2: press secretary Sarah Sanders] [ARG1: to respond to reports that Melania Trump lives in the Washington suburbs with her son and parents , rather than in the East Wing of the White House] .

During Monday 's briefing , a reporter asked [ARG0: press secretary Sarah Sanders] to [V: respond] [ARG1: to reports that Melania Trump lives in the Washington suburbs with her son and parents , rather than in the East Wing of the White House] .

During Monday 's briefing , a reporter asked press secretary Sarah Sanders to respond to reports that [ARG0: Melania Trump] [V: lives] [ARGM-LOC: in the Washington suburbs] [ARGM-MNR: with her son and parents] , [ARGM-ADV: rather than in the East Wing of the White House] .
